title: kaNNanai kaaNbadheppO
sahitya:
hamsaanandi




kaNNanai kANbadeppO! kArmEgha vaNNanukkenmEl enna veruppO?



anupallavi



viNNavaram paNiyum vENu vilOlan maNNaLanda vAyan mAyan gOpAlan



caraNam 1 naaTTai kurinji




puNNiyam vandu pOi pozhudu miga vAgudu paNNina kaNNireNDum pUttu

kavalai uNDAgudu

eNNi yeNNiyE manam EngiyE nOgudu paNNina paNDamellAm payaninri pOgudu



caraNam 2 sudda dhanyaasi



jAti mullai rOjA sampangi pUveDutten Adiyanda rahitam aNiya

mAlai toDuttEn

cEdiyonrum varaindu cEDiyiDam koDuttEn shOdikka vENDAmenru colli tUdu

viDuttEn



caraNam 3 aabhOgi



tAmadam ilAAmal tAdiyuDane cendREn nIrmalaikkAmal nimiSam varEn

enrAn

jAma nEram shenra pin sAvadhAnamAi vandAl shyAmaLanaikkANa samayam

idillai enrAn
